archimate:Requirement.name: IR.2.2.1: The information risk assessment should involve an assessment or estimation of potential business impact if the confidentiality, integrity or availability of information associated with the target environment were to be compromised.
archimate:Requirement.documentation: This is a standard topic modelled from the 2022 Version of the Standards Of Good Practice by ISF. It has been adopted as version 3 of the Security Baseline.
